org.kaaproject.kaa.client.event

Interface EventManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListenersResolver, Transactable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultEventManager

    public interface EventManager
extends EventListenersResolver, Transactable
    Interface for event management.
    Author:
    Taras Lemkin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearState()
      Clears the current manager's state.
      void engageDataChannel()
      Restrict manager to use data channel until releaseDataChannel() called

      Retrieves an event.

      Creates an Event and passes it to OPS

      • pollPendingEvents

        void engageDataChannel()
        Restrict manager to use data channel until releaseDataChannel() called

      • releaseDataChannel

        boolean releaseDataChannel()
        Allow manager to use data channel.
        Returns:
        true if there is data to be sent via data channel
        false otherwise
